promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute legendary bird normal-type pokemon with shiny feathers. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Chirplume, a a chibi cute legendary bird normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Blast Geyser. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "normal" or "Chirplume". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, bird-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, soft ambient light
generatedDescription: Meet Chirplume, the petite legendary feathered marvel with the power of Blast Geyser. This lively, lovable creature enchants grasslands with its angelic songs.
